title: Auxiliary Proprties
description: Holds a map of additional properties which help define the instance of XDM. These properties may differ instance to instance.

auxiliaryProperties.description: A map of properties which provide additional context or information. These keys are dynamic and their occurrence can differ for every XDM instance.

additionalProperties.description: List of possible values to the key
